verbs.description: Companies [V: are] scrambling to explain how they came to deposit money in the account of President Donald Trump ’s lawyer .
[ARG0: Companies] are [V: scrambling] [ARG1: to explain how they came to deposit money in the account of President Donald Trump ’s lawyer] .
[ARG0: Companies] are scrambling to [V: explain] [ARG1: how they came to deposit money in the account of President Donald Trump ’s lawyer] .
Companies are scrambling to explain [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG1: they] [V: came] [ARGM-PRP: to deposit money in the account of President Donald Trump ’s lawyer] .
Companies are scrambling to explain how [ARG0: they] came to [V: deposit] [ARG1: money] [ARG2: in the account of President Donald Trump ’s lawyer] .
